website_summaries.verdict: Pint-sized powerhouse that's perfect for customizing small and awkwardly-angled projects.
pros: Compact heat press with ceramic plate
Good choice for baby items, hats, plush toys and other small items
Auto shutoff and insulated base for safety
Many find it easier and safer to use than a mini iron
cons: May not heat as much as larger machines

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This little tool works perfectly however I wish I would’ve just spent the extra money to get the easy press two! When I was making a shirt for my mom I had to press in sections vs. just doing it all in one press. So overall the item works perfectly, shipping was quickly but, I would recommend just upgrading and getting the easy press two.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Mini Press
customer_reviews.text: Love this Cricut mini version of heat press! I was debating between the Cricut original sized heat press and this mini heat press. I’m glad I went with this mini one. It’s perfect for small objects like cups, hats and or applying a minimal graphic on a side of a t-shirt. It was easy to use and easy to store as it doesn’t take up much space. Definitely recommend this mini heat press to those crafters out there who like working on small objects.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Good item for intricate work
customer_reviews.text: Great little press for tennis shoes, hats or hard to press items. When I can’t use my big press on an item this one does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mini iron
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mini iron for sewing projects! I didn’t have enough space to keep a traditional iron in my sewing area, so this was the perfect solution. It doesn't perform as well as an iron, but it does the job for smaller projects. It is very easy to use and takes up very little space on my sewing table. Overall very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little press! Not only is it super cute but it heats up so quickly and is extremely easy to use and helpful for small projects. The only down side is it only has the three heat settings so you cannot adjust the temperature like with the big presses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am a HUGE cricut fan and they have done it again with this mini easy press! Great for small projects such as hats, scarves, masks etc as well as projects on sleeves and other hard to maneuver areas! Heats up quickly, has three settings and has its own base to place the hot press back in, no tipping up and worrying someone might touch the iron part while still hot.
